external_games.name: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen - Autobots

name: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen - Autobots
summary: Transformers Revenge of the Fallen: Autobots and Transformers Revenge of the Fallen: Decepticons are action-adventure video games based on the 2009 live action film Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen. They are the Nintendo DS port of Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen, but follows a different storyline.
